resource.description: Represents a key signing key (KSK) associated with a hosted zone. You can only have two KSKs per hosted zone.

properties.name: HostedZoneId
properties.description: The unique string (ID) used to identify a hosted zone.

type.description: The unique string (ID) used to identify a hosted zone.

properties.name: KeyManagementServiceArn
properties.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) for a customer managed key (CMK) in AWS Key Management Service (KMS). The KeyManagementServiceArn must be unique for each key signing key (KSK) in a single hosted zone.

type.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) for a customer managed key (CMK) in AWS Key Management Service (KMS). The KeyManagementServiceArn must be unique for each key signing key (KSK) in a single hosted zone.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: An alphanumeric string used to identify a key signing key (KSK). Name must be unique for each key signing key in the same hosted zone.

type.description: An alphanumeric string used to identify a key signing key (KSK). Name must be unique for each key signing key in the same hosted zone.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: A string specifying the initial status of the key signing key (KSK). You can set the value to ACTIVE or INACTIVE.

type.description: A string specifying the initial status of the key signing key (KSK). You can set the value to ACTIVE or INACTIVE.
